Text: Why isn't anyone moving?
Find Dusty
Where's Kat...?
Dusty, find Kat!
Follow Dusty
Where'd you go!?
Find Dusty
Dusty, don't just take off like that.
Follow Dusty
Again Dusty!?
Find Dusty
What's gotten into you?
Oh come on, Dusty!
You've got to stop that!
Kat must be close...
Find Kat
Kat's frozen like all the others.
Zaza... I'll do whatever it takes to bring you home.
Dusty: \n Meow!
I have to find Dusty.
I have to find Kat.
???: \n Meow!
Where did Kat go after we split up?
Kat was leading people to safety when the explosion went off.
Is the explosion on the Ark behind time stopping?
Are the children okay...?
Dusty, where are you?
Follow Dusty
Wait, Dusty!
You want me to follow you...?
Dusty!?
Are you leading me to Kat?
What happened to Hekseville?
The explosion with the Ark... Was that my fault?
Where'd Dusty go now?
Dusty, where are you going!?
How can I get this place back to normal?
I'd better find Kat. Together we can figure this out.
Kat!?
Not you too...
How'd this happen?
Wait! Now how am I supposed to find them?
Bit: \n The answers you seek are with the Nevi...
I heard something from over there.
A cat!
That way?
I need to follow Dusty.
I have to find Dusty...
I have to find Kat.
I need to find Kat.
Dusty!
Dusty, there you are!
There you are, Dusty!
They seem to vanish when I get near them.
At least it doesn't look like I can harm them.
What happened?

Raven, I'm afraid this 
 world system's bug is 
 more serious than I 
 thought.
I should mention that \n this isn't my true form.
I just use it when I \n need to reveal myself to \n people.
Though, I suppose no one \n is going to notice.
Why aren't they moving!? \n What happened to \n Hekseville?
A bit of system trouble \n caused the world's clock \n to stop.
I did what you told me! \n Why didn't it fix \n things?
Blame me if you like, \n but this is out of my \n control.
There are just too many \n variables involved.
One bug leads to \n another.
The final result? \n System freeze.

The one thing I do know 
 is that any direct 
 interference on my part 
 will make things worse.
How convenient! Fine, \n tell me what I need to \n do to fix this.

We were so close to 
 waking them. I need 
 to get time moving 
 again!

Unfortunately, the world 
 couldn't process the 
 explosive results of 
 the experiment.

The elements of light 
 and darkness that 
 power the Ark escaped 
 during the event.
It was almost as if \n they had a mind of \n their own...
Of course, that would \n be ridiculous... \n Although-
Just tell me what \n I need to do!
Oh, right. Bring \n back the Light \n and Darkness.
They fled into two \n powerful Keepers. \n Find them.

The Nevi are closely 
 tied to light and 
 darkness. They will be 
 your guide.

What, am I supposed to 
 walk up to a Nevi and 
 ask where the Light and 
 Darkness ran off to?
Cyanea! You can move?
The girl known as Cyanea \n is asleep, like the \n others.
I guard her dream - the \n dream that makes this \n world.

As long as she sleeps, 
 there is a chance that 
 she might repair the 
 dream.

Why does it always take 
 so long to get an answer 
 out of you Creator 
 types?
I need the element of \n Darkness you're guarding \n to fix the world.
A boy - one of your kind \n told me that.
A boy... \n Ah, you mean Bit.

The Darkness, you say. 
 Come to think of it, 
 something does feel 
 strange inside Cyanea.
When the Ark exploded, \n I noticed a presence \n entering her dream.
Let me show you \n the way.
Raven, look deep \n into my eyes-

Dreamer, not yet. 
 We need more than 
 the power of Darkness 
 to fix the Ark and time.
The light complements \n the dark.
If the power of \n Darkness entered you...
Then the element \n of Light must have \n entered Gade.

You must find him. 
 Only with both him 
 and Cyanea can we 
 continue.
Ah Raven, it's good \n to see you back to \n your old self.
You were a cute kid, but \n the past is the past.
I wanted to \n help you...

But something 
 happened to me 
 after the Ark 
 exploded.
Must be one of those \n "bugs" the kid keeps \n going on about.
Makes it tough \n for me to hold \n the world together.
Ah, there you are.
No explanations \n this time, just tell me \n what I need to do.
If only we could \n intervene directly, this \n would be so much easier.

Unfortunate, yes, but 
 that's the way it goes. 
 We need your help, 
 Raven.

It has to be you. You 
 are part of the problem, 
 but that's why you can 
 also be the solution.
I thought I said no \n explanations!

Then let's get to work. 
 Raven, we're going to 
 need Gade and 
 Cyanea's help.

Wait, what happened to 
 the elements of Light 
 and Darkness I was 
 supposed to recover?
You'll figure it out. \n "No explanations," \n right?
Right...

My eyes once served as a 
 conduit for Kat to 
 reach the secret world 
 of Cyanea's dreams.
Look into my eyes...
Are you ready?
I'll be taking \n you both together.
To the plane where \n light and dark reside!
Hmm...
All we can do \n now is hope.
Nevi!?
Find the Keeper \n of Darkness
They're not stopped like everything else...
The Nevi hold the answer... What does that mean?
It's Cyanea!
A light! I need to follow it.
The light's gone. Do I need to take down more Nevi?
I have to find the Keeper of Darkness...
Wait, Raven.
The light's flowing towards Auldnoir.
The light's flowing that way.
I think the light's flowing to Pleajeune.
I'm not sure how he's involved, but I need to find Gade.
Find the Keeper \n of Light
Defeating Nevi should help me track down the Keeper of Light.
That's Gade!
Bit: \n Now we're all together.
I have to find the Keeper of Light...
